label: 管領
本: Terms and Concepts in Japanese Medieval History . Journal of Japanese Studies . 1983
説明文: Deputy shōgun in the Muromachi bakufu who exercised power on behalf of the shōgun. Occupants were selected from three collateral branches of the Ashikaga house: Shiba, Hosokawa, and Hatakeyama.　[斯波、細川、畠山]
